main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a white light traveling ESE over Grosse Ile, Michigan, for approximately 3 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes,The object was described as a brilliant self-luminous elliptical shape with a whitish center,The object appeared sharp at one point and then fuzzy,The observer noted the object reached down to the ground at its lower point,The sighting was made using binoculars and a telescope.
witness description: Civilian observer John McKay Smith, male
